channel.title: Growth Stocks on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Growth Stocks on FinanClub

item.title: SE
item.description: score:-133 Chances: Growth stock investors could be in for an excellent year in 2024. Sea’s estimated fair value is US$73.00 based on 2 Stage Free Cash Flow to Equity. Risks: Geopolitical tensions between the United States and China as well as renewed conflict in the Middle East could impact Sea’s performance.

item.title: TOST
item.description: score:7 Chances: Toast has continued to execute on its mandate to transform the restaurant industry with technology. The company has expanded its customer base, increased sales, and pared its losses. Low-priced stocks like Toast may be tomorrow’s wealth-building market darlings. Risks: Toast has been beaten up since coming public, indicating market volatility.

item.title: NFLX
item.description: score:115 Chances: Netflix (NFLX) stock has continued its robust rally off its mid-2022 lows. With Squid Game: The Challenge reality series leaning on the strength of its impressive Squid Game franchise and new plans for its video game business, it’s hard not to feel better about the company’s growth story moving into 2024.
